name: blend
trans: a mixture or combination of different things

name: approach
trans: a way of dealing with something

name: manipulate
trans: to control something by using the hands

name: obstruction
trans: something immaterial that stands in the way and must be circumvented or surmounted

name: circumstance
trans: an event or condition connected with what is happening or has happened

name: hinder
trans: to limit the ability of someone to do something, or to limit the development of something

name: facial
trans: of or on the face

name: diagram
trans: a simple plan drawn to represent something, such as a machine, usually to explain how it works or how it is put together

name: confidence
trans: a feeling of having little doubt about yourself and your abilities, or a feeling of trust in someone or something

name: auditory
trans: of or involving hearing

name: verbal
trans: spoken rather than written

name: recite
trans: to say a piece of writing aloud from memory

name: kinesthetic
trans: relating to the use of body parts to feel the position and movement of your body

name: conventional
trans: following the usual practices of the past

name: fidget
trans: to make continuous small movements because you are uncomfortable or bored

name: incorporate
trans: to include something within something else

name: Encouragement
trans: words or behaviour that give someone confidence to do something

name: solitary
trans: being the only one, or not being with other similar things, often by choice

name: expose
trans: to make something covered or hidden able to be seen

name: dominant
trans: more important, strong, or noticeable than anything else of the same type
